ticket.title: What happened to safe_helper?
ticket.original-body:
I can't find any mention of Module.safe_helper in Rails 3. I upgraded my 2.3.8 app to use rails_xss and used `safe_helper` all over my helper modules. However, on upgrading to Rails 3.0 I'm getting `NoMethodError`'s for that. Acking the source code turns up no instances of `safe_helper`.
Was it intentionally removed from Rails 3? Or forgotten?
Here's the definition in rails_xss: http://github.com/rails/rails_xss/blob/master/lib/rails_xss/action_view.rb#L71-87
